spatial_accuracy.notes: General room placement is correct, but door swings and specific alignments differ from the source. The kitchen window placement is significantly altered compared to the original floor plan template.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are thick and consistent. However, there are discrepancies in door embedding and the secondary bedroom's entrance orientation.

furniture_mapping.notes: Most furniture matches the layout (twin beds, dining set, L-couch), but the twin beds in the left room are simplified into one bed and a larger dresser.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric rendering with clean lighting and consistent materials. The composition is professional and clear.

detected_errors.description: Second twin bed in the left bedroom is missing; replaced by a larger storage unit.
The kitchen window has been moved from the bottom wall to the right wall side.
Orientation of several door swings (bathroom and main bedrooms) does not match the 2D plan.
The L-shaped couch in the living area has been rotated 180 degrees compared to the plan.
